index.title: Ergatas - Partnering Supporters With Kingdom Workers
index.description: Search for Christian missionaries by location, skill, etc., across different  organizations. Find someone whose ministry you're passionate about supporting

home.title: Ergatas - Partnering Supporters With Kingdom Workers
home.description: Search for Christian missionaries by location, skill, etc., across different  organizations. Find someone whose ministry you're passionate about supporting

coming-soon.title: Ergatas - Partnering Supporters With Kingdom Workers
coming-soon.description: Search for Christian missionaries by location, skill, etc., across different  organizations. Find someone whose ministry you're passionate about supporting

about.title: About - Ergatas
about.description: Who we are, how Ergatas works, and why we should all support missionaries

contact.title: Contact - Ergatas
contact.description: Tell us what's on your mind.

confirm-sof.title: Confirm SoF - Ergatas
confirm-sof.description: Confirm your agreement to Ergatas terms, privacy and statement of faith

profile.title: Profile - Ergatas
profile.description: Create or Edit your worker profile

profile-detail.title: Profile Detail - Ergatas
profile-detail.description: Learn more about this missionary and consider partnering with them

page-error.title: Page Error- Ergatas
page-error.description: There was an error loading the requested page

org-application.title: Organization Application - Ergatas
org-application.description: A form to fill out to request a new organization be added to this site

organization-review.title: Organization Review - Ergatas
organization-review.description: A page for site admins to review organization applications

privacy.title: Privacy Statement - Ergatas
privacy.description: We value your privacy! Ergatas will never sell or disclose your email or non-public information

search.title: Search - Ergatas
search.description: Search for Christian missionaries by location, skill, organization, support level and more!

sof.title: Statement of Faith - Ergatas
sof.description: The Ergatas statement of faith. This is what we believe

verify-email.title: Email Verification - Ergatas
verify-email.description: Verify the email address used to register

get-started.title: Get Started - Ergatas
get-started.description: Create your worker profile, or start a guided search to find a worker for you

donate.title: Give - Ergatas
donate.description: While we encourage you to find a missionary on our site to donate too, we need a little support ourselves too! Help keep this site available with a donation today.

worker-donation.title: Worker Fund - Ergatas
worker-donation.description: Not sure which worker to donate to? Give to the general workers fund here! 100% of all funds donated here will be given to workers listed on our website.

daily-prayer.title: Missionary of the Day - Ergatas
daily-prayer.description: Sign up to pray for a missionary each day.

guided-search.title: Guided Search - Ergatas
guided-search.description: Let us help you find a missionary worker matching your interests and passions. Just answer a few questions and we'll find the workers!

learn.title: Learn - Ergatas
learn.description: Did you know most missionaries don't get their full paycheck from any one source? Learn more about missions and how you can be part of the team!

resources.title: Resources - Ergatas
resources.description: Learn how to be the best missionary partner you can! If you're a missionary, find links to training programs, and helpful tools to keep your partners engaged.

how-does-missionary-support-work.title: How Does Missionary Support Work? - Ergatas
how-does-missionary-support-work.description: Did you know most missionaries don't get their full paycheck from any one source? Learn more about how missionary partnership development works

how-can-i-partner-with-a-missionary.title: How Can I Partner with a Missionary? - Ergatas
how-can-i-partner-with-a-missionary.description: You can be part of the Great Commission by partnering with a missionary! Every team member is critical. Learn how you can partner with a missionary today

help-for-missionaries.title: Help for Missionaries - Ergatas
help-for-missionaries.description: Are you a missionary raising support? We can help, for free! Find more contacts by sharing your passion with the world!

engage-in-great-commission.title: Engage in the Great Commission- Ergatas
engage-in-great-commission.description: Engage in the Great Commission from Matthew 28. Find missionaries from different orgs going into all the world to preach the gospel! Join their team today!

christian-crowdfunding.title: Christian Crowdfunding for Missionaries - Ergatas
christian-crowdfunding.description: Are you a missionary? Setup a free crowdfunding page to help others find your ministry. Requires an existing donation page from your sending organization.

ergatas-mobilizer.title: Become An Ergatas Mobilizer- Ergatas
ergatas-mobilizer.description: Would you like to help many missionaries with their support raising all at once, without spending a dime? Become an Ergatas Mobilizer! Yes, it really is as glamorous as it sounds. So what is it?

search-for-missionaries.title: Search for Missionaries - Ergatas
search-for-missionaries.description: Find a missionary from any organization whose ministry you can be passionate about!

pray-for-a-missionary.title: Pray for A Missionary - Ergatas
pray-for-a-missionary.description: Every Kingdom worker needs a team of people praying for them and their ministry! Find a worker who reflects your passion and commit to pray for them today.

frontier-people-groups.title: Frontier People Groups (FPGs) - Ergatas
frontier-people-groups.description: Frontier People groups make up 25% of the world, but only 1% of all Kingdom Workers are working to reach them.

build-your-faith.title: Build Your Faith - Ergatas
build-your-faith.description: There are many ways to grow in our faith. One way to build your faith is through giving and seeing how God blesses you in return.

mission-boards.title: Mission Committees- Ergatas
mission-boards.description: How a church's missions committee can find missionaries and Kingdom workers that align with their existing passions and strategies.

how-can-i-help.title: How Can I Help? - Ergatas
how-can-i-help.description: Learn how you can help the ministry of Ergatas in ways other than giving.

joshua-project.title: Connect with Joshua Project - Ergatas
joshua-project.description: Connect your ministry to a country or people group with Joshua Project's information pages about them.

engaging-strategic-missionary-partners.title: Engaging Strategic Missionary Partners - Ergatas
engaging-strategic-missionary-partners.description: Many people desire to support missionaries fitting a certain profile, but this is currently a very difficult task. We present a solution.
